function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential absence of publication bias can lead to skewed data and inaccurate findings.","Impact":"Inaccurate findings may influence public health decisions and interventions based on flawed information.","Mitigation":"Implement transparent reporting guidelines and encourage the publication of all research findings, regardless of outcomes.","Technologies":"Data transparency and publication guidelines, publication bias assessment tools.","People":"Researchers, journals, public health authorities.","Owner":"Research institutions, journals, public health organizations."},{"Description":"High COVID-19 positivity rates among healthcare workers indicate increased risk of transmission within healthcare settings.","Impact":"Increased risk of healthcare worker infection, spread to patients, and potential strain on healthcare systems.","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control measures, comprehensive PPE policies, and regular testing for healthcare workers.","Technologies":"PPE, testing protocols, contact tracing, syndromic surveillance.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, healthcare facility management.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Variability in effectiveness of PPE and masking policies may lead to inconsistent protection against COVID-19 transmission in workplace settings.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission among workers, potential outbreaks, and disruption of essential services.","Mitigation":"Standardize PPE guidelines, provide adequate training on proper use, and enforce universal masking policies.","Technologies":"PPE, mask fit testing tools, training resources.","People":"Employers, employees, occupational health and safety officials.","Owner":"Employers, occupational health and safety regulators."}]}
